original_text: The leaders of the priests and the Pharisees heard what Jesus said in his stories. They knew that he was speaking against them.
korean_text: 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 예수의 비유를 듣고 자기들을 가리켜 말씀하심인 줄 알고

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the priests and the Pharisees heard
what Jesus said in his stories
They knew that he was speaking against them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 자신들을 비판하여 말하고 있음을 알았습니다
